freelance.title: Berry Game Calls eCommerce Website
freelance.description: I am currently working on building a custom website to meet the needs of my parents' family business. The new site aims to improve user experience with full page product pages, search, product categories,  an easily accessible shopping cart, a video and photo gallery, returning customer login, and a secure checkout. The full scope of the project will include a login for wholesale retailers to replace their current fax and phone system. *The project is currently supported in both mobile and desktop Chrome, Firefox and Safari with support for Edge and Internet Explorer coming soon.

hobby.title: Basketball Shooter iOS App
hobby.description: My own implementation of one level of Ketchapp's Basketball game built with gesture recognizers to simulate tossing the basketball, basic collision physics, scorekeeping and a shot clock.
